name: @ma-collective/maenifold
description: Persistent Graph-of-Thoughts with Graph-RAG retrieval. Eager MCP server where the corpus is chain-of-thought reasoning. Retrieve from HOW you thought, not just WHAT you know.

scripts.build: dotnet publish src/Maenifold.csproj -c Release --self-contained -o bin && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux && npm run build:osx && npm run build:osx-x64 && npm run build:win && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:linux: dotnet publish src/Maenifold.csproj -c Release -r linux-x64 --self-contained -p:PublishSingleFile=true -o bin/linux-x64
scripts.build:osx: dotnet publish src/Maenifold.csproj -c Release -r osx-arm64 --self-contained -p:PublishSingleFile=true -o bin/osx-arm64
scripts.build:osx-x64: dotnet publish src/Maenifold.csproj -c Release -r osx-x64 --self-contained -p:PublishSingleFile=true -o bin/osx-x64
scripts.build:win: dotnet publish src/Maenifold.csproj -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained -p:PublishSingleFile=true -o bin/win-x64

author: MSBrett

mcp.description: maenifold MCP Server - The topology of Ma-space. Knowledge management with WikiLinks and vector search
